```{r}
library(GGally)
library(dplyr)
library(corrplot)
human<-read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dirac6/IODS-project/master/data/human.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)
summary(human)
human_std <- scale(human)
pca_human <- prcomp(human_std)
biplot(pca_human, choices = 1:2, cex = c(0.8, 1), col = c("grey40", "deeppink2"))
```
